[[inst_hl_ldi_upr]]
==== HL.LDI.UPR

*Syntax:* hl.ldi.upr [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_ldi_upr.svg[HL.LDI.UPR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/PRE_INDEX
